thread.title: German Antimigrant Party Argues Over Makeover Effort

author: Bojan Pancevski
title: German Antimigrant Party Argues Over Makeover Effort

organizations.name: antimigrant party argues over makeover effort

text:
BERLIN—Frank-Christian Hansel, a Berlin lawmaker, was vigorously sweeping the floor of a subway station on Saturday as bemused passersby looked on. The real point of his action, undertaken beneath a banner reading Alternative for Germany, was to clean up his party’s image.
The country’s largest opposition party in parliament, known by its German acronym AfD, is grounded in a protest movement against migration. Its popularity has kept rising in polls since September’s national elections, and if that trend continues, the party...
